reviews.text:
Sach a beautiful temple for Hindu, i had go for visit 1st time and i was impresses to see the temple view i like their renovation design and colour texture
this temple is for Kali maa and you can go their for pray for you and your family
such a nice temple

The Kali Puja is a major festival celebrated at the Kali Mandir temple on Kali Mandir Road in Bargarh. 🎉 The festival honors the Goddess Maa Shyama Kali and is held during Diwali.

Yagyans, or fire sacrifices, are also performed as part of the festival.

The temple's main attraction is a large and beautiful statue of the Goddess Maa Shyama Kali, which is made from an alloy of eight metals.

A new temple for the Goddess was recently built, and it is a popular attraction for pilgrims. 🚩

One of the oldest 🛕 temple of
Bargarh.  Many devotees come here from far places too.

U can visit any time to heal yourself & to boost confidence 🙏🙏🙏
A single place solution for every problem

places_with_reviews.name: Gandhi Park
places_with_reviews.address: 8JPF+47P, Mohanty Pada Main Rd, Mohanty Pada, Dhanger, Bargarh, Odisha 768028, India

reviews.text: Well working swings nice space.
It's very nice place to hangout and best place for kids to play. I really love this place.

Its the one and only park situated in Bargarh toen.
Lawns with toys for kids and an outdoor gym for all.
A functional toy train is also available.
A cafeteria which serves packaged items and beverages.
Nice place but it's too small and it needs maintenance

This is one of the most important places of Bargarh as this place is dedicated to the Father of the Nation. Gandhi Jayanti is celebrated here every year. The life and many common activities of Bargarh is centred around this place. Mahatma Gandhi ki Jay.
I am very blessed, that I got your darshan MAA Samaleswari.My day was full of blessings.The beauty of this temple is Amazing. Its artwork is worth seeing.
Very nice temple , designs are too much unique 🥺❤️
It's a very good place to visit. Please visit here and get blessing of Maa Samalai

Very spiritual, peaceful and calm environment. A very beautiful temple full of amazing work and craftsmanship at its finest. Great design.

places_with_reviews.name: Sai Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: 8JR3+856, Slip Road to Sai Temple, Bargarh, Odisha 768028, India

reviews.text: Its a peaceful place of mind .... beautiful place of devotes, infrastructure well designed,  There is a river flowing near this temple.Sai Bab bless everyone always.

I remember when I was living near of Sai mandir i used to go here at evening time it's feels like so much peaceful arena i never found anywhere else, most beautiful things you can see here, everyday pandit ji do worship and changing the dress of idol of Sai, in the morning and in evening time when they sing arati and play Bhajan it's feels so peaceful, and near you can find jeera Nadi and overbridge

This is the famouse Sai Baba Temple of Bargarh. It is situated 2000meter ahead of Bhatli chowk and this place is very clean and beautiful. A small park is there and a Bhaban is there to organise different types of ceremoney like marriage,party,Badu and so on. Everyday 6pm on evening Aarti is given to Baba and for this so many people are visited there. Specially you find more people on Thursday. This day aftre puja a voga also given to all people present there or going for puja there. Sai Baba Birthday is also celebreat here every year and this is a very famouse and well known place of Bargarh city.
Peaceful Place right there 👏👏👏👏🙏🙏🙏🙏
Go during evening time nd you will get peace nd evening arti nd tranquility which is missing in Bargarh Town.

reviews.text: As an inhabitant of Bargarh district I have seen this place it symbolises that we the people of Bargarh love it, respect it, honor it and always want to keep our region,district safe, clean, neat it is not only a written but a concern for everyone to represent Bargarh's environment,its people,geography, land to other districts and become a typical for other districts too I ❤️❤️❤️Bargarh not by mouth only but by actions, works,responsibilities thank you 👍❤️
